channel.title: Benjamen Simon on Benjamen's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Benjamen Simon on Benjamen's Homepage

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hi! My name is Benjamen and I’m a Data Scientist and Statistics PhD student at Lancaster University. Welcome to my personal website and portfolio. If you’re looking for some example of general Data Science projects that I have done, I recommend looking here. You can click any of the tags in posts you like to find similar posts, or use the search bar. If you’re looking for the slides of a talk you saw me perform, check here, and feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions.
